statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT street_name, vehicle_count FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count > 100;
SELECT location_id, street_name, vehicle_count FROM traffic_patterns WHERE average_speed < 30.5;
SELECT street_name FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT location_id, average_speed FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count > 50 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT street_name, vehicle_count FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT location_id, street_name, average_speed FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY average_speed ASC;
SELECT street_name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY street_name HAVING num_records >= 2;
SELECT AVG(vehicle_count) AS avg_vehicle_count, MIN(average_speed) AS min_speed FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT location, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, speed ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE area_sq_km BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY city_name;
SELECT location, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city_name, population, area_sq_km FROM city_population WHERE population > 50000 AND area_sq_km > 100 ORDER BY area_sq_km ASC, population DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE street_name = 'Main Street';
SELECT date, time, traffic_volume FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT street_name, road_condition FROM city_infrastructure WHERE road_condition = 'Poor';
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM city_infrastructure WHERE street_lights = TRUE AND traffic_signals = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE street_name = 'Main Street';
SELECT date, time, traffic_volume FROM traffic_data WHERE date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT street_name, temperature, precipitation FROM traffic_data JOIN weather_data ON traffic_data.date = weather_data.date;
SELECT street_name, road_condition, street_lights FROM city_infrastructure WHERE road_condition = 'Poor';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 AND street_name LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM city_population;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT road_id, road_name, road_length FROM road_network ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT signal_id, signal_location, last_updated FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_status = 'GREEN';
SELECT plate_number, entry_timestamp, exit_timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE plate_number LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE entry_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT plate_number, exit_timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type='Car';
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM road_network ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, average_income FROM city_population WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY average_income DESC;
SELECT signal_location, signal_status FROM traffic_signals WHERE last_updated > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, direction, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60 AND direction = 'North';
SELECT id, date, location FROM RoadConditions WHERE condition = 'Snowy' ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC;
SELECT location, status FROM TrafficLights WHERE status = 'Red' OR status = 'Yellow' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM CityPlanning WHERE suitable_for_construction = TRUE AND current_population > 50000;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 50 AND direction='North' ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT location, condition FROM RoadConditions WHERE condition='Rainy' OR condition='Snowy' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, status, last_updated FROM TrafficLights WHERE status='Malfunctioning' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT location, level, traffic_intensity FROM CongestionLevels WHERE level='Heavy' AND traffic_intensity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC, traffic_intensity DESC
